snippet: You're reading a long, well-reported Times article, full of cogent observations from knowledgeable, on-the-record sources. Somewhere near the end, you read something like: "Ms. Jones said the problem had grown more acute in recent years." And you...
abstract: You're reading a long, well-reported Times article, full of cogent observations from knowledgeable, on-the-record sources. Somewhere near the end, you read something like: "Ms. Jones said the problem had grown more acute in recent years." And you wonder.
